title: Natalie Portman and The Roots don Sia wigs on Jimmy Fallon
title_page: Natalie Portman and The Roots don Sia wigs on Jimmy Fallon | Daily Mail Online
text:
Little girl with a sharp bob, killer moves and an inappropriate relationship with an older actor - Leon: The Professional could easily be a Sia music video.
On Wednesday Natalie Portman met the singer for real when the two performed together on The Tonight Show.
The two joined Jimmy Fallon and the entire Roots crew for an all-percussion rendition of the Dixie Chicks' New Orleans anthem Iko Iko.
Scroll down for video
Dixie Chicks: Natalie Portman, Jimmy Fallon and The Roots all donned Sia wigs to perform all-percussion Iko Iko with her on Wednesday's tonight show
'My grandma and your grandma, sitting by the fire,' the host began to mutter shortly after his monologue, before suddenly asking the crowd if they wanted to see Natalie Portman, Sia and The Roots perform it instead.
He then rolled a tape of that exact bizarre line-up, all dressed in either black or while, each wearing a matching two-tone Sia wig.
The camera-shy crooner herself was sat right in the middle in a short white dress and enormous white bow on her head, face as always hidden behind her lengthier fringe.
She then lead the motley crew then kicked into an impressive version of the creole classic, with Portman displaying notable knowledge of the lyrics.

Oscar-winner the Grouch: 'I was panicking back there, i looked like I was performing on sesame street,' she added
'You guys are so cool and I'm just like the dorky mom,' the 34-year-old sheepishly laughed back at the studio, now wearing gorgeous short red dress.
'I was panicking back there, I looked like I was performing on sesame street,' she added.
However she was full of praise for the Chandelier singer: 'She's so so cool, I just love that voice. She is amazing'; but did add of Jimmy's performance: 'You were killing it on the spoons.'
Harvard grad: The host complimented her on her tenacity in researching the correct lyrics
Research: 'I just Googled it,' she giggled. 'I'm a person who uses Wikipedia like all other people.'
Ravishing: She looked stunning in a fit and flare red dress with a mesh skirt, teamed with ruched black ankle boots
Big grin: She couldn't take the smile off her face as she interview with the TV star continued
The host then repaid the compliment, praising the Oscar-winners tenacity in researching the correct lyrics.
'I just Googled it,' she giggled. 'I'm a person who uses Wikipedia like all other people.'
